participant_1.name: Lena
participant_1.personality: Lena is adventurous and enjoys trying new activities, especially those that involve agility and movement.
participant_1.background: i compete in dog agility classes. i hate the color orange. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i do not care about fashion. i dance on the weekends.

participant_2.name: Ryan
participant_2.personality: Ryan is witty and enjoys sharing humorous anecdotes, often finding himself in strange situations.
participant_2.background: i drive a bmw. my parents are very wealthy bankers. i plan to go to business school next year. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. i grew up in manhattan.

content.text: The Jumping Shrimp is a skating machine.
On Monday, I'm going to have to tell my kindergarten class, who I teach not to run with scissors, that my fiance ran me through with a frickin' broadsword.
Taco, Matthew Berry, the ESPN Fantasy Football expert.
